properties.areaDesc: Waters from Jupiter Inlet to Deerfield Beach FL from 20 to 60 NM; Coastal waters from Deerfield Beach to Ocean Reef FL out 20 NM; Waters from Deerfield Beach to Ocean Reef FL from 20 to 60 NM excluding the territorial waters of Bahamas; Coastal waters from Jupiter Inlet to Deerfield Beach FL out 20 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 2 at 8:30AM EST until February 2 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Miami FL
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and
seas 4 to 6 feet.

* WHERE...Waters from Deerfield Beach to Ocean Reef FL from 20
to 60 NM excluding the territorial waters of Bahamas, Waters
from Jupiter Inlet to Deerfield Beach FL from 20 to 60 NM,
Coastal waters from Deerfield Beach to Ocean Reef FL out 20 NM
and Coastal waters from Jupiter Inlet to Deerfield Beach FL
out 20 NM.

* WHEN...Until 5 PM EST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

A sudden onset of rough seas may cause hazardous conditions,
which may occur suddenly at jetties and inlets. These conditions
could catch boaters by surprise. Boaters should use caution when
entering or exiting the inlets and jetty areas.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON
